attributes.action: introduce legislation to fix the retail price of fuel oils to the average monthly cost of Brent crude.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: There are many similar petitions, see: http://search.petitions.pm.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/petitions/search.lsim?qt=reduce+fuel&sr=0&nh=10&cs=&sc=number10&oq=review+council+funding&sb=0&ha=1157&mt=0
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
